title: Charming FURNISHED 1 Bed/1 Bath Townhouse, water included in rent!
description:
Fully furnished, move-in ready! Water & furniture included in rent.
Are you looking for a move-in ready rental in Philly with a friendly and responsive landlord?
You're in luck! My one-of-a-kind, FURNISHED 1 bedroom/1 bath home in South Philly is available for rent starting May 15. The property is a tri-level 950 sq ft townhouse in Pennsport. I love that it was originally built in the 1880s and has a ton of character.
The house is in a great location with:
- a walk score of 92
- 2 blocks from bus lines
- 3 parks nearby
- easy street parking
- close to restaurants/Head House Square
- 10 min walk to Target!
Amenities include:
- central heat + AC
- washer + dryer
- deck
- finished basement
- new windows, blinds, and kitchen appliances (including dishwasher)
My two favorite things about the house are the deck on the second floor and the mosaic on the side of the house that was personally designed and installed in 2016 by well-known Magic Gardens artist, Isaiah Zagar. This place is super unique!
The house is fully furnished (plus artwork if desired) and all items were purchased for my personal use so it's nice stuff (read: not IKEA)!
Additional perks:
- water is included (so no separate water bill)
- no gas bill
- WiFi is already set up so you can get online as soon as you move in!
If you think you might want to snag this awesome place starting in May, please send me a message. I'm happy to answer any questions and provide additional details. I look forward to hearing from you!
(sorry, no pets)
